name: Spider jump (Kostra)
description:
An entry to Mini Game Jam: Web with limitation: There is no ground. A simple platformer where you control a spider with arrows and space. If you fall down, you appear at the top, so there is no ground. You have to collect all the parts of the web. There are 6 levels with increasing difficulty.

All sprites were made by myself.

Music:
Wholesome by Kevin MacLeod
https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.html

SFX:
https://freesound.org/
